code: var Session={setLogin:function setLogin(login){localStorage.setItem("login",login?"1":"0");},isLogin:function isLogin(){return localStorage.getItem("login")==="1";},getUser:function getUser(){return localStorage.getItem("user")==="1"?"usuario":"admin";},setUser:function setUser(user){localStorage.setItem("user",user=="usuario"?"1":"0");}};export default Session;
